title: Is anyone else getting matched against way better players in flex?
body:
I'm a bronze quality player, and my flex rank rank is currently bronze 3. My solo/duo rank is silver 5, with a little help from some people better than me just for the border. I only with other bronze players for flex, because my friends and I don't really care about getting better.

So can anyone explain to me why we're constantly getting matched against high silver/low gold? One game I went 0/10 in lane, only to find later I was against a gold 1 ahri. How am i supposed to beat that?

replies.body: This time of year (end of season ) the frequency of smurfs and boosters goes through the roof.
